00020 #ifndef TLM_CORE_TLM_INITIATOR_SOCKET_H_INCLUDED_
00021 #define TLM_CORE_TLM_INITIATOR_SOCKET_H_INCLUDED_

00023 #include "tlm_core/tlm_2/tlm_sockets/tlm_base_socket_if.h"
00024 #include "tlm_core/tlm_2/tlm_2_interfaces/tlm_fw_bw_ifs.h"

00026 #if defined(__clang__) || \
00027    (defined(__GNUC__) && ((__GNUC__ * 1000 + __GNUC_MINOR__) >= 4006))

00030 #pragma GCC diagnostic ignored "-Woverloaded-virtual"

00033 namespace tlm {
00034 
00035 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH = 32,
00036           typename FW_IF = tlm_fw_transport_if<>,
00037           typename BW_IF = tlm_bw_transport_if<> >
00038 class tlm_base_initiator_socket_b
00039 {
00040 public:
00041   virtual ~tlm_base_initiator_socket_b() {}
00042 
00043   virtual sc_core::sc_port_b<FW_IF> &       get_base_port() = 0;
00044   virtual sc_core::sc_port_b<FW_IF> const & get_base_port() const = 0;
00045   virtual                    BW_IF  &       get_base_interface() = 0;
00046   virtual                    BW_IF  const & get_base_interface() const = 0;
00047   virtual sc_core::sc_export<BW_IF> &       get_base_export() = 0;
00048   virtual sc_core::sc_export<BW_IF> const & get_base_export() const = 0;
00049 };
00050 
00051 
00052 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH,
00053           typename FW_IF,
00054           typename BW_IF> class tlm_base_target_socket_b;
00055 
00056 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH,
00057           typename FW_IF,
00058           typename BW_IF,
00059           int N,
00060           sc_core::sc_port_policy POL> class tlm_base_target_socket;
00061 
00062 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH = 32,
00063           typename FW_IF = tlm_fw_transport_if<>,
00064           typename BW_IF = tlm_bw_transport_if<>,
00065           int N = 1,
00066           sc_core::sc_port_policy POL = sc_core::SC_ONE_OR_MORE_BOUND>
00067 class tlm_base_initiator_socket : public tlm_base_socket_if,
00068                                   public tlm_base_initiator_socket_b<BUSWIDTH, FW_IF, BW_IF>,
00069                                   public sc_core::sc_port<FW_IF, N, POL>
00070 {
00071 public:
00072   typedef FW_IF fw_interface_type;
00073   typedef BW_IF bw_interface_type;
00074   typedef sc_core::sc_port<fw_interface_type,N,POL>   port_type;
00075 
00076   typedef sc_core::sc_export<bw_interface_type> export_type;
00077 
00078   typedef tlm_base_target_socket_b<BUSWIDTH,
00079                                    fw_interface_type,
00080                                    bw_interface_type> base_target_socket_type;
00081   typedef tlm_base_initiator_socket_b<BUSWIDTH,
00082                                       fw_interface_type,
00083                                       bw_interface_type> base_type;
00084 
00085   template <unsigned int, typename, typename, int, sc_core::sc_port_policy>
00086   friend class tlm_base_target_socket;
00087 
00088 public:
00089   tlm_base_initiator_socket()
00090   : port_type(sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name("tlm_base_initiator_socket"))
00091   , m_export(sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name("tlm_base_initiator_socket_export"))
00092   {
00093   }
00094 
00095   explicit tlm_base_initiator_socket(const char* name)
00096   : port_type(name)
00097   , m_export(sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name((std::string(name) + "_export").c_str()))
00098   {
00099   }
00100 
00101   virtual const char* kind() const
00102   {
00103     return "tlm_base_initiator_socket";
00104   }
00105 
00106   //
00107   // Bind initiator socket to target socket
00108   // - Binds the port of the initiator socket to the export of the target
00109   //   socket
00110   // - Binds the port of the target socket to the export of the initiator
00111   //   socket
00112   //
00113   virtual void bind(base_target_socket_type& s)
00114   {
00115     // initiator.port -> target.export
00116     (get_base_port())(s.get_base_interface());
00117     // target.port -> initiator.export
00118     (s.get_base_port())(get_base_interface());
00119   }
00120 
00121   void operator() (base_target_socket_type& s)
00122   {
00123     bind(s);
00124   }
00125 
00126   //
00127   // Bind initiator socket to initiator socket (hierarchical bind)
00128   // - Binds both the export and the port
00129   //
00130   virtual void bind(base_type& s)
00131   {
00132     // port
00133     (get_base_port())(s.get_base_port());
00134     // export
00135     (s.get_base_export())(get_base_export());
00136   }
00137 
00138   void operator() (base_type& s)
00139   {
00140     bind(s);
00141   }
00142 
00143   //
00144   // Bind interface to socket
00145   // - Binds the interface to the export of this socket
00146   //
00147   virtual void bind(bw_interface_type& ifs)
00148   {
00149     (get_base_export())(ifs);
00150   }
00151 
00152   void operator() (bw_interface_type& s)
00153   {
00154     bind(s);
00155   }
00156 
00157   // Implementation of tlm_base_socket_if functions
00158   virtual sc_core::sc_port_base &         get_port_base()
00159     { return *this; }
00160   virtual sc_core::sc_port_base const &   get_port_base() const
00161     { return *this; }
00162   virtual sc_core::sc_export_base &       get_export_base()
00163     { return m_export; }
00164   virtual sc_core::sc_export_base const & get_export_base() const
00165     { return m_export; }
00166   virtual unsigned int                    get_bus_width() const
00167     { return BUSWIDTH; }
00168   virtual tlm_socket_category             get_socket_category() const
00169     { return TLM_INITIATOR_SOCKET; }
00170 
00171   // Implementation of tlm_base_target_socket_b functions
00172   virtual sc_core::sc_port_b<FW_IF> &       get_base_port()
00173     { return *this; }
00174   virtual sc_core::sc_port_b<FW_IF> const & get_base_port() const
00175     { return *this; }
00176 
00177   virtual                    BW_IF  &       get_base_interface()
00178     { return m_export; }
00179   virtual                    BW_IF  const & get_base_interface() const
00180     { return m_export; }
00181 
00182   virtual sc_core::sc_export<BW_IF> &       get_base_export()
00183     { return m_export; }
00184   virtual sc_core::sc_export<BW_IF> const & get_base_export() const
00185     { return m_export; }
00186 
00187 protected:
00188   export_type m_export;
00189 };
00190 
00191 //
00192 // Convenience socket classes
00193 //
00194 
00195 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH = 32,
00196           typename TYPES = tlm_base_protocol_types,
00197           int N = 1,
00198           sc_core::sc_port_policy POL = sc_core::SC_ONE_OR_MORE_BOUND>
00199 class tlm_initiator_socket :
00200   public tlm_base_initiator_socket<BUSWIDTH,
00201                                tlm_fw_transport_if<TYPES>,
00202                                tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES>,
00203                                N, POL>
00204 {
00205 public:
00206   tlm_initiator_socket() :
00207     tlm_base_initiator_socket<BUSWIDTH,
00208                          tlm_fw_transport_if<TYPES>,
00209                          tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES>,
00210                          N, POL>()
00211   {
00212   }
00213 
00214   explicit tlm_initiator_socket(const char* name) :
00215     tlm_base_initiator_socket<BUSWIDTH,
00216                          tlm_fw_transport_if<TYPES>,
00217                          tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES>,
00218                          N, POL>(name)
00219   {
00220   }
00221 
00222   virtual const char* kind() const
00223   {
00224     return "tlm_initiator_socket";
00225   }
00226 
00227   virtual sc_core::sc_type_index get_protocol_types() const
00228   {
00229     return typeid(TYPES);
00230   }
00231 };
00232 
00233 } // namespace tlm
